Reviews.Title: “just what you need in a city break hotel”
Reviews.Author: MonaLisa12345
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel simple clean cleaned night towels floor changed soaps shampoo bathroom shower stayed 3rd floor window inner courtyard wasnt noisy am light sleeper bring earplugs travel companions stayed 2nd floor window street found noisy breakfast fine toasts yoghurts juices coffee nice kitchen sweets missed fresh fruit receptionstaff friendly didnt headboard oldfashioned covered fabric bit unhygienic staying central rome pay hotel similar city center

Reviews.Title: “QUERKY, QUIET, CLEAN AND CLOSE TO CENTRE”
Reviews.Author: BEEGEE77
Reviews.Content: friendly articulate reception staff basic dark furniture bed comfortable bathroom shower cubicle loved thick towels tiled floors bedroom hot cold air conditioning heating appeared centrally controlled despite notice advising visitors push card slot wait 15 minutes air conditioning kick enquired reception informed hadnt switched window public private clean buffet breakfast choice adequate hot dishes available breakfast interestingly querky alcoves walls painted frescoes hotel quiet street close metro terminii centre nearest forum colloseum hotel near restaurants cafes serving quality food reasonable prices

Reviews.Title: “Average plus - especially for big city; Breakfast good, room clean”
Reviews.Author: zeckster
Reviews.Content: staff friendly location bit farther train metro stations preferred bus lines pretty close clean nicely decorated shower drain ongoing issue plumbing bathroom contained drain center floor typically water building contantly hear water drain pipes monitor contruction street noisy breakfast morning days fair tradeoffs expensive stay city

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Friendly Staff and Clean”
Reviews.Author: blackpearl1234
Reviews.Content: booked hotel based trip advisor recommendations perfect close train station metro shops restaurants walking distance including coleseum forum staff helped directions restaurant suggestions ate restaurants night short walk hotel balcony facing fairly street bathroom shower block via busy street maria maggiore church hoponhop bus stop recommend hotel hope stay future ladies found little hotel opted breakfast terrace start busy days front desk staff extremely helpful visited mid september 2010 third trip rome hotel stays experienced

Reviews.Title: “Great price, service and quiet area, just a little further out from city center”
Reviews.Author: vicky_lb1
Reviews.Content: rome stop italy vacation hotel set standards hotel expecations customer service amazing ive stayed 45 star resorts front answered questions recommendations questions italy clean importantly air conditioner amazing especially trekking throughout rome day breakfast served cute clean terrace breakfast spread nice simple pride food nice complaint advertised collosseum little nightlife ie pantheon woudl cab bus metro system bus system easy understand wasnt restaurants short walking distance 2 block radius people dont sacrifice clean air conditioning location

Reviews.Title: “Great service and location”
Reviews.Author: geaus
Reviews.Content: staff helpful giving maps helping book tickets sights etc clean location walking distance relatively quiet street sleeping wasnt breakfast included stay consisted cold meats cheese pastries bread cereal fruit yoghurt coffee juice bad showers water pressure terrible overall recommend hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “A Great Homebase for Visiting Rome”
Reviews.Author: seek4fun
Reviews.Content: cool little hotel sign outside stars name dont offer elegant staircases luxurious suites deliver feel welcome soon walk front door cosy lobby friendly gentleman greeted assisted moment entered spoke desk people shifts spoke english pleasant seen elevator wife rode luggage climbed stairs operated fairly quickly stayed nights top notch nicely decorated super bathrooms recently renovated including bidet shower glass door hutch clothes safe inside flat sceen tv stations italian windows suitcase stands mirrors wall chair super clean floors tiled night pizza street hotel rooftop tiled floor plants outdoor tables chairs supper location hotel couldnt quieter street parallel larger busier street options safe returning dark pleasant 10 minute walk sidewalks termini station timed romes attractions nearby wife walk easily including colosseum vatican city foot buses subway close theres grocery store locals block street hotel offers breakfast 7 am lovely left days missed breakie day 645 am clerk help ourselves left booked hotel internet paid 50 euros night feb 75 euros night mar wife love visiting rome exactly staying
